sentences.en: Even extreme grief may ultimately vent itself in violence - but more generally takes the form of apathy.
sentences.cn: 过于悲愤最终也可能转化成暴力 -- 不过,在多数情况下,会以冷漠的形式表现出来.

sentences.en: Extreme poverty had reduced them to a state of apathy.
sentences.cn: 极端的贫困使他们万念俱灰.

sentences.en: For this apathy there were three causes.
sentences.cn: 所以这样冷淡,有三个理由.

sentences.en: He has an apathy to food.
He was sunk in apathy after his failure.
My parents do not feel apathy about the election.
sentences.cn: 我父母对此次选举并非漠不关心.

sentences.en: She had sunk into a dreary apathy and would not be roused.
sentences.cn: 她已经陷入了一种可怕的麻木状态,无法唤起她的精神.

sentences.en: She heard the story with apathy.
sentences.cn: 她无动于衷地听了这个故事.

sentences.en: She must do something to drag him from his apathy -- but she could not ask about Mother.
sentences.cn: 她必须设法把他从目前的冷漠状态中拉回来 ---- 可是她不能问母亲.

sentences.en: The appearance of the opening duck seemed first to arouse the Hurons from their apathy.
sentences.cn: 张开的船帆的出现立即引起了休仑人的警觉.

sentences.en: The campaign failed because of public apathy.
sentences.cn: 由于公众反应冷淡，这次运动失败了。

sentences.en: The pettishness that might be caressed into fondness had yielded to a listless apathy.
sentences.cn: 原先那种暴性子,本来还可以被爱抚软化成娇气,现在却变成冷淡无情了.

sentences.en: The soldiers who had survived were thrown comletely off balance , reduced to apathy.
sentences.cn: 死里逃生的士兵精神麻木,呆若木鸡.

sentences.en: There is widespread apathy among the electorate.
They told me about isolation and public apathy.
sentences.cn: 他们向我谈到了孤立无助和公众的冷漠。

sentences.en: Yet, ominous images of the century still loom over me, challenging my apathy.
sentences.cn: 然而不祥的世纪形象,不肯放过我的淡漠.

words.tran_cn: 冷漠的；无动于衷的，缺乏兴趣的
冷淡地；无动于衷地；不感兴趣地

trans.tran_cn: 漠然，冷淡，无兴趣，无动于衷
trans.tran_en: the feeling of not being interested in something, and not willing to make any effort to change or improve things
